thread.section_title: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Life Saver Kal
thread.title_full: Life Saver Kal - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Timemeansmoney
title: Life Saver Kal
text: I stayed again at the palace. Same wonderful service. I came looking for help at the concierge desk and asked Kal how long of a window I should leave to get to JFK on time. He asked me about my flight # and airline carrier. He found out my flight actually left from LGA not JFK. He was right and he really saved my life, this is why I love to stay at the palace because I know I'm in good hands.
